name: Snowboard Trials - Unending Winter
description:
HTML version added, this is the exact same as the jam version (even includes the cool bugs). This worked fine without any lag, just a few hiccups at some points. But if its bad then the executable version will most likely handle better.

Winter is over but everything is still frozen over. Not only that but its Getting worse, the thick sheets of snow started to take over Yokai mountain. And somebody is boasting being the cause of this. The culprit is at Misty lake but the area around it is too dangerous The only way in is down the Yokai mountain.

Go down the Yokai mountain as fast as possible, by going through flag checks you increase speed. Getting hit with Danmaku or obstacles will slow you down. 

For the Touhou 10 gamejam.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Shift to jump
  • Esc to pause
  • Mouse controls on buttons

Cool bugs:

  • Do not hit restart when you lose. or the will game crash.
  • The title theme plays for some reason during the stage???

Who did this:

  • Flaffal
